very fun but its an easy soulslike

whether youve played blasphemous or not b2 is practically a perfect game lots of challenging and memorable boss battles plus plenty of reasons to come back and play ng if you love metroidvaniastyle games especially with retro graphics this is the game for you
very good

this game is a sequel to the first one in terms of esthetics and lore but gameplaywise is much closer to a traditional metroidvania it looses some of the more soulslike elements in a move that for me is brilliant as it opens itself to explore different gameplay options that were restricted by this philosophy  to me this is the better game perhaps not as original as the previous one but certainly a more fun experience
good

not exactly as good as the first but still one of my favorite games ever with new versatile options with great uses amazing exploration and a stunning art style aside from one horrible boss every other boss is at worst above average and at best one of the best fights ive ever fought i hope everyone who sees this plays this masterpiece and the first as well
this is kinda like one of my fav game series of all time
cool game

didnt want to leave a review just yet until finishing both blasphemous games at 100 but couldnt wait any longer story plot wise i love it it does fall to comparison of the first one for a little bit but nonetheless the addition of several weapons powers ups and customization in builds make up for it true is not as hard as the first one but the environment and atmosphere of the game makes you forget about the difficulty
